entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -41.6°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
